about_the_game:
Cosplay Crisis Convention is a visual novel where all your dreams come true. Jacob Kirby was just a regular geek when he found himself dragged into a massive intergalactic conflict…between three beautiful girls. Which side will he choose? It’s up to you!

Protect the Earth or leave the home planet to sail the universe? Find your soulmate or teach alien girls how to love? Attend a panel discussion with the most famous stars in the industry or watch a mysterious performance in the hall? You can even try to save Dr. Quinzel from jumping into acid! The choice is yours. But remember, every decision has its price.






Gameplay & Features:
  • Simple Visual Novel user experience
  • Choices to help you select your favorite girl and to solve disputes
  • Choose a schedule for each day of the Con
  • About 100,000 words of text.
  • 4 or more endings.
  • More than 5 backgrounds and 20 CG are in the demo and more are planned!
  • Steam Achievements
  • Steam Trading Cards (when we are given access)
